content: In the tightly controlled city of Stenograd, where the omnipresent Behavioral Compliance Index decides everyone’s fate, Marek Halden—the system’s reclusive architect—dies mysteriously, setting the stage for turmoil. In the uneasy aftermath, Nikola Petrak spends a sleepless night pondering Halden’s final cryptic message before daringly using master keys to trigger a citywide reset, erasing every trace of the BCI. As Halden’s enigmatic “Echoes” replace public scores, the city is plunged into confusion and wonder, prompting neighbors to gather and debate their meanings. Freed from the grip of algorithmic judgment, Stenograd’s residents abandon rigid rankings for vibrant assemblies and open debates, covering blank walls with new murals proclaiming, “You are more than your score.” As the Council’s power evaporates, the city discovers a new sense of self, building a community around shared dialogue and hope instead of control.
